posts.post_title: Two SGC 40 T206 Southern Leaguers For Sale
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I have two SGC 40 Southern Leaguers for sale. $100 for one, $185 for the pair. This includes shipping. You can contact me at: [url]cy@cyscards.com[/url]. I prefer a money order or check for payment.

Thanks.

Cy
